title: Ban me 20 mins for been DC? Are you serious?
body: OK, guys, have you experienced Disconnect from the game for like 5 mins, and when you lose that game, you been reported for afk? And riot bans me 20 mins for beed D.C. 5 mins. Are you serious? please fix this AFK penalty system!!! holy moly!{{champion:83}} {{summoner:17}} {{item:2010}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body:
You won't face LeaverBuster punishments for an isolated incident on an account with more than a few games played. It is based on a percentage of games played. The punishments also typically start at 5 minutes and ramp up to 20.

[You can find the LeaverBuster FAQ here.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)
